mapper.select: SELECT aia.issue_id AS caseId, aia.attachment_id, aia.url, aia.file_name, aia.project_id, aia.object_version_number, aia.created_by, aia.creation_date, aia.last_update_date, aia.last_updated_by FROM agile_issue_attachment aia WHERE aia.issue_id IN ( SELECT ai.issue_id FROM agile_issue ai WHERE ai.type_code IN ('issue_test','issue_auto_test') AND ai.apply_type = 'test' )
